original_text: But in the last days it shall come to pass, that the mountain of the house of the Lord shall be established in the top of the mountains, and it shall be exalted above the hills; and people shall flow unto it.
korean_text: 끝날에 이르러는 여호와의 전의 산이 산들의 꼭대기에 굳게 서며 작은 산들 위에 뛰어나고 민족들이 그리로 몰려갈 것이라

sentences.original_text: that the mountain of the house of the Lord
shall be established in the top of the mountains
and it shall be exalted above the hills
and people shall flow unto it
